string.value: Finally the last question. After this, you'll no longer be a beginning.
Rain advised that it's time to leave Maple Island. In Victoria Island, you can choose a job and start a lot of new adventures. Head to Southperry to get to Victoria Island!
Alright, last question! Talk to me when you're ready.

This is important! You can only make the job advancement at Victoria Island, but you're currently on Maple Island. Where do you go to get a ride to Victoria Island? 

#L0##bSouthperry#l
#L1#Amherst#l
#L2#No way I can get there#k#l
That's absolutely correct. Head over to Southperry and get on the #rship#k that heads to Victoria Island.

Once you get there, the first thing you want to do is make the job advancement. \nYou should make sure you're the right level to advance. Head to Perion to become a Warrior, Henesys to become a Bowman, Kerning City to be a Thief, and Ellinia to be a Magician. #bPress W for the world map if you get lost#k. Alright, happy Mapling!
You won't find any ports at Amherst. Head over to the only place in Maple Island with a port to catch a ride to Victoria Island.
You won't be able to come back once you leave this place, but trust me, you CAN leaveâ€¦
